title: Database Management System (CRUD Web App)
summary: ASP.NET + Oracle SQL web application supporting CRUD, data validation, secure form handling, and integrity constraints. Designed to simulate enterprise record-management systems used in healthcare, finance, and operations.
process: Designed a normalized relational schema with foreign keys, triggers, and constraints
Implemented robust CRUD operations with backend checks ensuring referential integrity
Built ASP.NET UI with forms, grid views, pagination, and error feedback messages
Added server-side validation to prevent SQL injection, null inputs, and invalid states
Created stored procedures for common queries and optimized repetitive operations
Tested key workflows, edge cases, and data consistency using sample datasets
impact: Replaced manual record tracking with a structured, searchable digital system
Improved data accuracy by enforcing validation and database constraints
Demonstrated ability to build full-stack apps and manage end-to-end data flow
Strengthened understanding of enterprise CRUD systems like EMRs, SIS, and CRM software
